price: Báyẹn ni A ṣe sọ (ìrántí) kalẹ̀ ní ohun kíké pẹ̀lú èdè Lárúbáwá. A sì ṣe àlàyé oníran-ànran ìlérí sínú rẹ̀ nítorí kí wọ́n lè ṣọ́ra (fún ìyà) tàbí nítorí kí ó lè jẹ́ ìrántí fún wọn.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا وَصَرَّفۡنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ أَوۡ يُحۡدِثُ لَهُمۡ ذِكۡرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan waṣarrafnā fīhi mina al-waʿīdi laʿallahum yattaqūna aw yuḥ'dithu lahum dhik'ran
